name: Cranberry Apple Crisp
steps: In a large bowl combine first 5 ingredients. Stir in apples and cranberry sauce. Spoon into a 8x8x2 baking dish.
For topping: Combine nuts or oats, brown sugar and flour. Cut butter in with 2 knives or pastry blender until crumbly. Sprinkle over cranberry mixture.
Bake for 50 minutes or until apples are tender and juices that bubble up in center are shiny and clear. Cool slightly, serve warm.
